Kuman sa klupe Holandije može samo u Barselonu
Klauzula u ugovoru koja će se aktivirati na leto

03 Nov 2019

Vrlo je moguće da će Barselona uskora tražiti novog trenera, pošto Ernesteu Valverdeu ne ide kako se u klubu očekuje. Ali, novi trener sigurno neće biti Ronald Kuman. Barem ne do 2020. godine, iako ga često pominju kao kandidata za šefa struke.
Selektor reprezentacije Holandije je potvrdio u jednoj televizijskoj emisiji u domovini da ima klauzulu u ugovoru koji je potpisao u februaru sledeće godine, po kojoj može sa te funkcije da ode samo u Barselonu. A i to ne do sledeće godine.
Ta klauzula će se aktivirati sledećeg leta, po završetku Evropskog prvenstva. Tada će Kuman moći da ode sa klupe, ali samo u Barselonu.„Posle Evropskog prvenstva će biti momenat za procenu urađenog i za odluke. Po klauzuli, moći ću da odem samo u jedan klub, a i moja je želja da u karijeri vodim Barselonu“, rekao je Kuman.
Inače, informacija je došla do javnosti tako što je nenamerno otkrio direktor reprezentacije Holandije Niko-Jan Hugma.„Izletelo mu je, mada je mislio da je to poznat podatak. Zapljusnule su me posle toga razne reakcije sa svih strana sveta, pogotovo iz Španije. Nisam to očekivao“, priznao je Kuman.
Ronald Kuman je bio igrač Barselone, kojoj je golom iz slobodnog udarca u produžetku meča sa Sampdorijom, doneo 1992. godine prvu titulu prvaka Evrope.
Foto: Reuters
text:
Kuman from the bench of the Netherlands can only in Barcelona
Contract clause to be activated in the summer

03 Nov 2019

It is very possible that Barcelona will soon be looking for a new coach, since Erneste Valverde does not go as expected at the club. But the new coach will certainly not be Ronald Kuman. At least not until 2020, though they often mention him as a candidate for the profession.
The Netherlands national team coach has confirmed in a television show in his home country that he has a clause in a contract he signed in February next year, under which he can only leave the post in Barcelona. And not until next year.
That clause will be activated next summer, after the European Championship is over. Then Kuman will be able to leave the bench, but only in Barcelona. "After the European Championships, there will be moments for judging what has been done and for decisions. According to the clause, I will only be able to go to one club, and my wish is to lead Barcelona in my career, ”said Kuman.
Otherwise, the information came to the public by inadvertently disclosing the director of the national team of the Netherlands Niko-Jan Hugma. "He flew out, though he thought it was known information. After that, I was overwhelmed by various reactions from all over the world, especially from Spain. I didn't expect it, "Kuman admitted.
Ronald Kuman was a Barcelona player who, in a free kick in the overtime match with Sampdoria, brought him the first European Championship title in 1992.
